alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:52AM CST until February 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity affecting Franklin Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Boeuf River near Fort Necessity. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 50.0 feet, Widespread flooding of farm and agricultural land is occurring along and near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 49.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 50.0 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Boeuf River Fort Necessit 50.0 49.4 Sun 8 am CST 49.7 49.9 50.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST.
